name: Sigil of slaughter
examine: Pay 45 Slayer Points to choose your own non-boss specific Slayer Task. Double the chance of a superior slayer monster appearing. Toggled on, you have a 25% chance for a Slayer Task kill to not count towards the task while still gaining you Slayer XP. Toggled off, 25% chance for a kill to count as 2. This Sigil does not stack with any bracelet effects.
